mapper.select: SELECT isl.log_id AS logId, isl.create_time AS createTime, isl.type_description AS typeDescription, isl.pay_user_id AS payUserId, isl.paied_user_id AS paiedUserId, isl.book_id AS bookId, isl.order_status AS orderStatus, isl.ip AS ip, isl.update_time AS updateTime, isl.exchangeable_cash_amount AS exchangeableCashAmount, isl.welfare_cash_amount AS welfareCashAmount FROM inf_settlement_log AS isl WHERE isl.log_id = #{logId}
SELECT UserName FROM sys_user WHERE UserId = #{userId}
SELECT BookName FROM wor_book WHERE BookId = #{bookId}
